content.original: Developed by the Clans, Enhanced Imaging is an advanced targeting and piloting system for use with humanoid shaped combat vehicles such as BattleMechs. While offering considerable advantages, EI inflicts serious side effects on the user, including possible mental instability, nerve damage and death.
content.prevOriginal: Developed by the Clans, Enhanced Imaging is an advanced targeting and piloting system for use with humanoid shaped combat vehicles such as BattleMechs. While offering considerable advantages, EI inflicts serious side effects on the user, including possible mental instability, nerve damage and death.
content.content: 由氏族开发,增强成像(EI)是一种先进的瞄准和驾驶系统,可与人型作战载具(如战斗机甲)一起使用.EI虽然具有相当大的优势,但会对使用者造成严重的副作用,包括精神不稳定、神经损伤和死亡的可能.

content.original: The Apple Churchill 2000 Fire Control System was designed for use on a wide variety of BattleMechs. As more and more designs became LosTech, Apple Interstellar continued to manufacture the Churchill 2000 to an ever expanding market. Originally designed as a more nuanced, control system, it managed to find a market in many light, medium, and even some heavy BattleMechs that fielded Autocannon 2s.
content.prevOriginal: The Apple Churchill 2000 Fire Control System was designed for use on a wide variety of BattleMechs. As more and more designs became LosTech, Apple Interstellar continued to manufacture the Churchill 2000 to an ever expanding market. Originally designed as a more nuanced, control system, it managed to find a market in many light, medium, and even some heavy BattleMechs that fielded Autocannon 2s.
content.content: 苹果丘吉尔2000火控系统(FCS)被设计用于多种战斗机甲.随着越来越多的技术变为失落科技,苹果星际公司继续为不断扩大的市场制造着丘吉尔2000.它最初被设计为一种更细致的控制系统,而且也成功的在许多装备了AC2的轻型、中型甚至一些重型机甲上获得了市场.

content.original: Targeting Computers are sophisticated pieces of electronics that, unlike normal targeting systems, physically help MechWarriors target their opponents. Recoil compensators and gyroscopic stabilizers are used to prevent normal weapon drift from factors such as recoil and movement while the computer accounts for atmospheric and other conditions to present an accurate ''lead'' on the target. This allows for more surgical precision of weapons fire, especially with naturally accurate systems.
content.prevOriginal: Targeting Computers are sophisticated pieces of electronics that, unlike normal targeting systems, physically help MechWarriors target their opponents. Recoil compensators and gyroscopic stabilizers are used to prevent normal weapon drift from factors such as recoil and movement while the computer accounts for atmospheric and other conditions to present an accurate ''lead'' on the target. This allows for more surgical precision of weapons fire, especially with naturally accurate systems.
content.content: 瞄准电脑(TC)是一种复杂的电子设备,和普通的瞄准系统不同,它可以帮助机甲战士瞄准他们的对手.后座补偿器和陀螺仪稳定器用于防止后座和运动等因素造成武器漂移,同时电脑还考虑了大气和其他条件,以准确的"指引"目标.这是一种可以进行更精确射击的设备,特别使用自然的精确系统.

content.original: The Apple Churchill 1000 series fire control systems was developed on Machintosh during the late 2900s. Intended as an upgrade for most light and medium FCS systems that specialized with AC/2 weaponry at long ranges. It managed to find a few niche markets within the Solaris scene as a rather cheap, yet effective, FCS system for mechs that demand effectiveness at long range. Within the majority of the Inner Sphere however, it had received a second line relegation, in favor of the Apple Churchill 2000.
content.prevOriginal: The Apple Churchill 1000 series fire control systems was developed on Machintosh during the late 2900s. Intended as an upgrade for most light and medium FCS systems that specialized with AC/2 weaponry at long ranges. It managed to find a few niche markets within the Solaris scene as a rather cheap, yet effective, FCS system for mechs that demand effectiveness at long range. Within the majority of the Inner Sphere however, it had received a second line relegation, in favor of the Apple Churchill 2000.
content.content: 苹果丘吉尔1000系列火控系统是在30世纪晚些时候在麦金托什(Machintosh)开发的. 该系统旨在为使用AC2武器作为远程武器的轻型和中型机甲提供火控系统升级.它在索拉里斯区域获得了一些市场,作为一个相当便宜和有效的火控系统,被一些有远程效能需求的机甲所需要.然而在大多数情况下,在内天体领域,它被降级为二线,这有利于苹果丘吉尔2000的销售.

content.original: The Octagon Accutrack I was commissioned in 3025 as the ongoing mech conflicts found more and more skilled pilots utilizing obstructions in order to reduce oncoming fire. Outfitted with a simple prediction system, it allowed a 'Mech pilot a temporary window to land accurate shots on targets without fear of hitting the cover around the enemy.

Outfitted with a simple prediction system, it allowed a 'Mech pilot a temporary window to land accurate shots on targets without fear of hitting the cover around the enemy.
content.content: Octagon Accutrack I于3025年投入使用,因为在正在进行的机甲冲突中发现越来越多的熟练驾驶员利用障碍物减少迎面火力.它让驾驶员获得一个临时"窗口",可以进行更精确的射击,而不是担心打到敌人周围的掩体上.

content.original: PASSIVE: Attacking with a single weapon ignores COVER and GUARDED on the target.

content.original: The XXXII Fire Control System is just one of many in a long line of Fire Control Systems developed by the Clans during their Exodus from the Inner Sphere. The XXXII was the first true home grown Clan Fire Control System that was fielded in high number on Long Range Missile equipped BattleMechs. Cannot be used with other Missile TTS and enables using Artemis IV Ammo.

content.content: XXXII火控系统只是氏族从内天体撤离期间研发的一系列火控系统中的一个.XXXII是第一个真正的本土火控系统,大量部署在装备有远程导弹的机甲上.不能和其他导弹TTS一起使用,可以使用月神IV弹药.

content.original: Substantially increases the clustering of this unit's LRM weapons and boosts the stability damage of SRMs by 50%.
content.prevOriginal: Substantially increases the clustering of this unit's LRM weapons and boosts the stability damage of SRMs by 50%.
content.content: 大大增加了该单位LRM武器的群组命中,将SRM的稳定伤害提高50%.

content.original: The Octagon Accutrak II was designed with memory in mind. Being one of the few control systems with a dedicated prediction and memory module. Allowing it to calculate the expected position of a mech even as it enters cover; allowing it to continue to make accurate strikes against any target within the sensor's line of sight.
content.prevOriginal: The Octagon Accutrak II was designed with memory in mind. Being one of the few control systems with a dedicated prediction and memory module. Allowing it to calculate the expected position of a mech even as it enters cover; allowing it to continue to make accurate strikes against any target within the sensor's line of sight.
content.content: Octagon Accutrack II设计时考虑到了内部存储.它是为数不多的具有专用预测和存储模块的控制系统之一.允许它在进入遮蔽时计算机甲的预期位置;允许它继续对传感器视线范围内的目标进行精确打击.

content.original: Sometime during the Clan Invasions, out of use Anti Air platforms equipped 'Mechs armed with the Flak-1A had their systems rewritten with replacement framework. Disabling the Aerospace Asset tracking system allowed the unit's radar to focus more on ground assets.  This greatly improved the spread of the LBX systems commonly utilized on 'Mechs, at the cost of a long refit cycle to re-ready the mech for Anti Air use.
content.prevOriginal: Sometime during the Clan Invasions, out of use Anti Air platforms equipped 'Mechs armed with the Flak-1A had their systems rewritten with replacement framework. Disabling the Aerospace Asset tracking system allowed the unit's radar to focus more on ground assets.  This greatly improved the spread of the LBX systems commonly utilized on 'Mechs, at the cost of a long refit cycle to re-ready the mech for Anti Air use.
content.content: 在氏族入侵的时候,装备有过时的高射炮-1A防空平台作为武装的机甲通过重写的系统和框架.禁用了空中目标追踪系统以更多关注地面目标.这大大提高机甲上常用的LBX系统的普及率,但代价是需要花费很长的改装周期来重新恢复机甲的防空.

content.original: The FoxxFire Fire Control System showed up in the Solaris Arena before being adopted by multiple Houses' Urban Warfare troops. Offering improved management of the unit's onboard flame tanks. .
content.prevOriginal: The FoxxFire Fire Control System showed up in the Solaris Arena before being adopted by multiple Houses' Urban Warfare troops. Offering improved management of the unit's onboard flame tanks. .
content.content: FoxxFire火控系统在被多个城市作战部队采用前就出现在了索拉里斯竞技场上.为单位的机载喷火器提供了更好的管理.

content.original: The Eagle Eye 400 FCS was originally pitched in combination with the Prototype Gauss Rifle developed by the Lyran Commonwealth at the time. A unique blend of targeting scopes, and high point calculation framework, allowed the pinpoint accurate gauss rifle to counteract the effects of down range turbulence from the safety of a firer's Mech. This helped minimize the training required to field such a highly accurate projectile by a third in tests.
content.prevOriginal: The Eagle Eye 400 FCS was originally pitched in combination with the Prototype Gauss Rifle developed by the Lyran Commonwealth at the time. A unique blend of targeting scopes, and high point calculation framework, allowed the pinpoint accurate gauss rifle to counteract the effects of down range turbulence from the safety of a firer's Mech. This helped minimize the training required to field such a highly accurate projectile by a third in tests.
content.content: 鹰眼400最初与当时由天琴座同盟国开发的高斯线膛炮原型一起使用.一种独特的瞄准范围和高点计算框架的组合,使得以精确为定位的高斯线膛炮可以抵消在近距离开火所造成的湍流的影响.这有助于减少上战场前所需要的训练时间,比如减少了三分之一发射高精度炮弹所需要的训练.

content.original: The Eagle Eye 400X was a rather odd product of the Eagle Eye program. Taking the original's weather monitoring suite, it stripped out some of the down range forecasting effects at long range, in favor of a dedicated computer to balance the electrical throughput on the weapon. This allows the 'Mech to achieve better velocity of the slug, at the cost of accuracy beyond a medium range.
content.prevOriginal: The Eagle Eye 400X was a rather odd product of the Eagle Eye program. Taking the original's weather monitoring suite, it stripped out some of the down range forecasting effects at long range, in favor of a dedicated computer to balance the electrical throughput on the weapon. This allows the 'Mech to achieve better velocity of the slug, at the cost of accuracy beyond a medium range.
content.content: 鹰眼400X是鹰眼计划中一个相当奇怪的产品.以原始的天气检测套件为例,它去掉了一些远程的下降预测效果,而以一台专用计算机来调整稳定武器上的充电量.这使的"机甲"能以中程以外的精度作为代价获得更好的弹头速度.

content.original: Designed to interface with Handheld Weaponry does this FCS confer superior flexibility with aiming any such device and HandHeld Melee Weapons
content.prevOriginal: Designed to interface with Handheld Weaponry does this FCS confer superior flexibility with aiming any such device and HandHeld Melee Weapons

content.original: The O-P 911 is a rather old Fire Control System. Surpassed by other models late in the Succession Wars by the O-P 1078. This model offered a dedicated system of capacitor controls to 'Mechs, decreasing the heat and energy consumption of Laser weaponry.

content.original: A unique Fire Control System that overcharges the mechanisms that reload Machine Guns mounted on the mech. Forcing ammunition into their chambers, regardless of practicality, it managed to produce a noticeable effect. Though it is unclear to the designers if the MachineGun are being fired from the Machine Gun, or being ejected from the ports under the weapons themselves.

content.content: 一种独特的火控系统,它能对装在机甲上的机枪进行过充.不管性能如何,它都能将弹药送入机甲的枪膛内,从而产生明显的效果.尽管设计着不清楚子弹是从枪口发射的还是从武器下方的进弹口射出的.

content.original: Developed by the Clan's for the Pir-1. This Fire Control System pairs a set of computers, and sensors to smooth out the kinks in the automatic feeding lines of Machine Guns. Using fine micro-switches, this Controller can exchange rounds in an instant, always insuring the weapons are fed. The rest of the weight is taken up by a small windage calculator. Taking calculation strain away from the pilot, and routing it through yet another two computation centers.
content.prevOriginal: Developed by the Clan's for the Pir-1. This Fire Control System pairs a set of computers, and sensors to smooth out the kinks in the automatic feeding lines of Machine Guns. content.content: 由氏族为Pir-1开发.该火控系统将一组计算机和传感器匹配,以消除机枪自动供弹线的扭结.使用精细的微动切换器,该控制器可以瞬间更换子弹,始终确保武器的供弹.其余的重量是携带的是一个风阻计算器.将计算应变的压力从驾驶员身上转移到另外的两个计算中心.

content.original: The Angst Clear View 1A was designed for the Solaris Market. Each Clear View 1A system had to be painfully calibrated to the Pilot's Neurohelm. Coupled with a movement prediction algorithm, it allowed the 'Mech to engage in lightning fast strikes without telegraphing the intent of the Pilot. Closing the Enemies' dodging window by around half.
content.prevOriginal: The Angst Clear View 1A was designed for the Solaris Market. Each Clear View 1A system had to be painfully calibrated to the Pilot's Neurohelm. Coupled with a movement prediction algorithm, it allowed the 'Mech to engage in lightning fast strikes without telegraphing the intent of the Pilot. content.content: 恐怖清晰视界1A是为了索拉里斯市场设计的.每个清晰视界1A都必须和驾驶员神经头盔进行痛苦的校准.再加上运动预测算法,它让机甲拥有在不泄露驾驶员意图的情况下进行闪电般快速打击的能力.降低敌人近一半的躲避空间.

content.original: The IMB 433 Fire Control System was designed to stagger the fire of missiles onboard a BattleMech. While a rather simple Control Suite, the multiple profiles needed for each aspect of tube management are precalculated. Upon being fed manufacturer information on Missile Tubes, as well as Ammunition Loads, the IMB is capable of releasing one rocket after another in a staggered volley. Limiting the total radiant heat buildup within the weapon system; regardless of factors.

content.content: IMB433火控系统被设计用于让机甲上的导弹错开发射.虽然是一个相当简单的控制套件,但管理的每个方面都需要从多个方面进行预先计算.在收到有关导弹发射器和弹药上的制造商数据后,IMB能够以错开的方式发射,限制武器系统内的总辐射热累积;不管外界因素如何.

content.original: The Vehicular Direct Neural Interface was a special type of cybernetic implant developed for the Manei Domini. The system worked in principle similar to the Clans' Enhanced Imaging system, allowing MechWarriors, aerospace fighter pilots, battle armor troopers and even combat vehicle and Small Craft crews to become one with their machines. Unlike the EI system, however, VDNI was able to ward off the short-term negative effects of the technology by employing improved circuit breakers and forcing users to regularly ingest a special chemical agent.
content.prevOriginal: The Vehicular Direct Neural Interface was a special type of cybernetic implant developed for the Manei Domini. The system worked in principle similar to the Clans' Enhanced Imaging system, allowing MechWarriors, aerospace fighter pilots, battle armor troopers and even combat vehicle and Small Craft crews to become one with their machines. Unlike the EI system, however, VDNI was able to ward off the short-term negative effects of the technology by employing improved circuit breakers and forcing users to regularly ingest a special chemical agent.
content.content: 媒介直接神经接口(VDNI)是为Manei Domini开发的一种特殊类型控制植入物.该系统在原理上与氏族增强成像(EI)系统类似,允许机甲战士、战斗机驾驶员、战斗装甲兵、甚至是作战车辆和小型艇与他们的机器成为一体.然而与EI系统不同,VDNI是可以通过使用改进断路器强制用户定期摄入特殊化学物质抵御该技术的短期负面影响.

content.original: A BattleMech’s cockpit is sealed, pressurized and fitted with a lifesupport system. A limited supply of air and water is contained within the ’Mech. If air or water exists outside of the 'Mech, fresh oxygen can be supplied for an unlimited through the filtration system.
content.prevOriginal: A BattleMech’s cockpit is sealed, pressurized and fitted with a lifesupport system. A limited supply of air and water is contained within the ’Mech. If air or water exists outside of the 'Mech, fresh oxygen can be supplied for an unlimited through the filtration system.
content.content: 战斗机甲的座舱是密封加压的,并装有维生系统.机甲内含有有限的空气和水.如果机甲外有空气或水,则可以通过过滤系统无限量供应新鲜氧气.

content.original:
All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock cockpit configuration, which can be upgraded for improved performance. The Console adds a complete set of controls for a second MechWarrior with added command and control facilities, allowing for better Lance coordination by upgrading initiative.

Star League-vintage Command Consoles are very rare by 3025 because 'Mechs equipped in this way were favoured targets in battle.
content.prevOriginal:
All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock cockpit configuration, which can be upgraded for improved performance. The Console adds a complete set of controls for a second MechWarrior with added command and control facilities, allowing for better Lance coordination by upgrading initiative.

Star League-vintage Command Consoles are very rare by 3025 because 'Mechs equipped in this way were favoured targets in battle.
content.content:
所有机甲都配备了一个可以升级以提高性能的可配置座舱.控制台为加入指挥和控制设施的第二驾驶员添加了一整套的控制系统,以提高主动性并更好的协调小队

到3025年,星联的老式指挥控制台已经非常罕见,因为搭载该装备的机甲是战斗中最受喜爱的目标.

content.original: Yeah Boss, whatever you brought me here, this is art! Next level cybernetics, at the base this is a simple DNI System with a VR pod, but all its failsafes got triple buffered and shunted into back up relays. On top of that, most of the basic Cockpit is gone, and you may not believe it, but the seat basically turns into a Wheelchair!
content.prevOriginal: Yeah Boss, whatever you brought me here, this is art! Next level cybernetics, at the base this is a simple DNI System with a VR pod, but all its failsafes got triple buffered and shunted into back up relays. On top of that, most of the basic Cockpit is gone, and you may not believe it, but the seat basically turns into a Wheelchair!
content.content: 老板,不管你把我带到那,这都是艺术!下一代控制理论,基于带有虚拟现实吊舱的DNI系统,但它对所有故障都提供了三重缓冲,并分流到备用继电器中.除此之外,大部分基本座舱都不见了,你可能不相信,座椅基本上变成了轮椅.

content.original: The Torso Cockpit has long been a dream of BattleMech designers. By moving the MechWarrior to a more heavily protected area, an army would be able to keep its more experienced soldiers in the fight a lot longer. The idea remained a dream until the unlocking of the Helm Memory Core provided a jump-start to many technological projects.
content.prevOriginal: The Torso Cockpit has long been a dream of BattleMech designers. By moving the MechWarrior to a more heavily protected area, an army would be able to keep its more experienced soldiers in the fight a lot longer. The idea remained a dream until the unlocking of the Helm Memory Core provided a jump-start to many technological projects.
content.content: 躯干座舱一直以来都是机甲设计师的梦想.通过将机甲战士移到一个更受保护的部位,军队可以让更有经验的战士在战斗中生存更长时间.这个想法一直是一个梦想,直到海姆(Helm)记忆核心的解锁为许多技术的开发提供了助力.
头部被命中时,驾驶员不再受伤
